Summary: sphere moving steady from north to south
divs: Sighting Detailsworking outside in a lumber yard, sunny day, i looked up at the moon which was visible to the east when i saw a shiny sphere cruzing in a strait line above the auburn airport going from north to south at a steady speed id say around 150 mph judgeing by the speeds i watch the airplanes use every day while landing and leaving the airport. i tried to get a coworkers attention but he wasnt paying attention, so i watched the object fly further south toward the town of sumner until it faded from view in under a minute. id say this object was kinda small, under the size of a car and around 3 or 4 hundred ft. in the air. looked like the sun was shinning off the object whick looked like reflective silver, when i first saw it i imediatley thought ufo or somekind of new drone but saw no moving parts.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Auburn
There were no other sightings in Auburn on or around February 19th 2013
